fqTitle: Will any new states implement abortion bans by August 2024?
fqBody: This question resolves as YES if, by August 31, 2024, at least one additional U.S. state implements an abortion ban that was not in place as of October 1, 2023. The implementation must be confirmed by official state announcements or reputable news sources. If no new states implement abortion bans, the question resolves as NO.
